title: those new start guardian skin are cool but..
body:
I like the new start guardian skin but i wish there was a 6th member to the team to fill the jungle star guardian role like {{champion:131}} . Right now we have 2 support star guardians{{champion:117}} {{champion:40}}, top is{{champion:78}} , mid{{champion:99}}  and adc {{champion:222}} .

 Who knows in most magical girl anime there always atleast 6-8 sailor mood had 8 so who knows maybe we got to be patient i guess. Might get these 3 {{champion:131}} {{champion:89}} eight one going to be between {{champion:39}}  are {{champion:43}} .

 What you guys thought do you think 3 more star guardian in the future?

Im hype for star guardian jinx red hair =D

replies.body:
My main problem with these skins are my wallet isn't big enough 

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

lol well my bad XD
Poppy is a great Jungler just as Lulu is a wonderful top.
